title: 🔥 2 bed/1 bath in Pilsen!Your cat and dog is welcomed!
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post

This is a beautiful 2 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment in the heart of Pilsen!Close to Harrison Park!The park features - indoor pool, outdoor gymnastics bars, tennis courts, basketball courts, baseball fields, soccer fields, track.
The unit is in close proximity to the National Mexican Museum of Art, walking distance from Walgreens, ALDI, COSTCO, Dunkin’ Donuts, Pete’s Fresh Market etc.
Within a mile from I-90/94, I-55, I-290, and I-294.
Great location for commuters, employees of UIC, Cook County Hospital, SINAI, and Downtown Chicago.
Pets up to 35LB are welcomed,no fee (no aggressive breeds.)
- Minimum credit score of 600 required(or co-signer)
**Please contact our leasing agent Lucy via text message at 773 877 9647 for additional information and to schedule a viewing.
